text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Refurbished: Acer Aspire 7 A717-72G-76V1 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

The Refurbished: Acer Aspire 7 A717-72G-76V1 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the keyboard could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Refurbished: Acer Aspire 7 A717-72G-76V1 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Refurbished: Acer Aspire 7 A717-72G-76V1 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Acer Aspire 7 A717-72G-76V1 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A Gaming Laptop!
